attributes.additional_details:
We have put together this petition in response to Salford City Council’s proposals to withdraw funding from at least two Day Centres – Humphrey Booth in Ordsall and Craig Hall in Irlam.

These Centres provide crucial support for elderly people and people with learning disabilities.

We, the undersigned call on the Government to do what it can to ensure that Salford City Council does not take this action.
